meanings.definition: A breed of large, rough-coated hound used for hunting otters.
meanings.sent1: The otterhounds tracked the otters along the riverbank.
meanings.sent2: We saw a pack of otterhounds on the hunt near the lake.
meanings.sent3: The otterhounds decided to take a break and go fishing instead.
meanings.sent4: The otterhounds' determination to catch the otters was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The howls of the otterhounds echoed through the forest.
